sentences.cn: 一座杂乱无序拓展的现代城镇
一座无计划扩展的巨大城市

sentences.en: And the next instant he was sprawling on the floor!
sentences.cn: 可是想不到自己反倒被打翻在地上!

sentences.en: China's sprawling cities are also driving up power demand .
sentences.cn: 中国城镇地区的向外扩张也拉高了对电力的需求。

sentences.en: He keeps forgetting the words and the song is a sprawling mess.
sentences.cn: 他老是忘词，歌被唱得乱七八糟。

sentences.en: He locked his knee against the man's inner thigh and sent him sprawling to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他用膝盖抵住那个人的大腿内侧，将他按趴在地上。

sentences.en: He saw a black sprawling prison full of tiny black cells in which people live.
sentences.cn: 他看见一座不成格局的黑色监狱,许许多多黑色小牢房里都住着人.

sentences.en: He was sprawling in an armchair in front of the TV.
sentences.cn: 他伸开手脚坐在电视机前的一张扶手椅上。

sentences.en: He was sprawling on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 他手脚张开地躺在沙发上.

sentences.en: Johnny's right fist flashed, and the young man went sprawling.
sentences.cn: 约翰右拳一挥, 将年轻人打翻在地.

sentences.en: Some nine or ten lines of writing in Julia's uneven and sprawling handwriting came below.
sentences.cn: 朱丽娅用她那歪歪斜斜的字体不整齐地在下面写了九、十行.

sentences.en: Still sprawling there she asked, " Well? Come for another eh? "
sentences.cn: 依旧斜着身,她说: “ 怎样 ?吃出甜头来了是怎着? ”

sentences.en: The sprawling city contained some 4m people.
sentences.cn: 这个不断扩张的城市容纳了约400万人口。

sentences.en: The Tanglin was spacious , sprawling, and stuffy.
sentences.cn: 坦格林地方倒很大,但很散漫而且闷热.

sentences.en: Within two minutes we were sprawling across the carpet.
sentences.cn: 不到两分钟,我们都趴在地毯上.

words.tran_cn: 蔓生的，不规则地伸展的

phrases.tran_cn: 城市扩张；都市向郊区扩张的现象

trans.tran_cn: 蔓延的，杂乱无序伸展的
trans.tran_en: spreading over a wide area in an untidy or unattractive way
